params._acrossInputToken: Address of the token that will be bridged via Across as the inputToken.
params._allowedSelectors: Function selectors that are allowed to be called on the exchange.
params._exchange: Address of the exchange where tokens will be swapped.
params._spokePool: Address of the SpokePool contract that we'll submit deposits to.
params._swapToken: Address of the token that will be swapped for acrossInputToken. Cannot be 0x0

swapAndBridge(bytes,uint256,uint256,(add.details: If swapToken or acrossInputToken are the native token for this chain then this function might fail. the assumption is that this function will handle only ERC20 tokens.

params.depositData: Specifies the Across deposit params we'll send after the swap.
params.minExpectedInputTokenAmount: Minimum amount of received depositData.inputToken that we'll submit bridge deposit with.
params.routerCalldata: ABI encoded function data to call on router. Should form a swap of swapToken for enough of acrossInputToken, otherwise this function will revert.
params.swapTokenAmount: Amount of swapToken to swap for a minimum amount of depositData.inputToken.

swapAndBridge(bytes,uint256,uint256,(add.notice: Swaps tokens on this chain via specified router before submitting Across deposit atomically. Caller can specify their slippage tolerance for the swap and Across deposit params.

userdoc.notice: Allows caller to swap between two pre-specified tokens on a chain before bridging the received token via Across atomically. Provides safety checks post-swap and before-deposit.
